ValidationRule.description: Requires Data Source to be specified for Tile Value, Tile Badge, Subtitle, and List Column map types. This ensures explicit configuration and prevents reliance on fallback behavior.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(HM_Map_Type__c, 'Tile Value'), ISPICKVAL(HM_Map_Type__c, 'Tile Badge'), ISPICKVAL(HM_Map_Type__c, 'Subtitle'), ISPICKVAL(HM_Map_Type__c, 'List Column') ), ISBLANK(HM_Data_Source__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Data Source is required for Tile Value, Tile Badge, Subtitle, and List Column map types. Please select a data source.
